entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:36 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 02:17 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
